common.firstLoginTutorialDescription: Welcome to our warehouse management system! To get started, please change your password and go through a short training to familiarize yourself with key features.
common.tutorialIntro: This tutorial will guide you through the basic functions of the JYSK Warehouse system.
common.tutorialStep1Content: Learn how to quickly find articles using ID or barcode scanning. This is crucial for daily operations.
common.tutorialStep2Content: Use the barcode scanning feature for quick searching and adding of articles. It's efficient and reduces errors.
common.tutorialStep3Content: As a warehouse manager, you will learn to create, edit, and delete racks. Proper organization of racks is fundamental for an efficient warehouse.
common.tutorialStep4Content: Discover how to mass add articles to racks. This feature will save you a lot of time when stocking new goods.
common.tutorialStep5Content: As an administrator, you will learn to manage user accounts, roles, and permissions. Ensuring correct access is key to system security.
common.tutorialStep6Content: As an administrator, you will learn to add, edit, and delete stores. This is essential for managing multiple branches.
common.tutorialStep7Content: As an administrator, you can view system activity logs, which is useful for auditing and troubleshooting.
common.tutorialCompleteMessage: Congratulations, you have successfully completed the initial training. You are now ready to start working!
common.exportDataPageDescription: Select the data you want to export and choose the format.
